backend/main.mo: Defines types and logic for trip plans, itineraries, packing lists, promoted listings, user profiles, and authorization with map‑based storage and generator functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to frontend files, components, and test IDs for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures routes, layout, theming, and auth/role guards for the React app.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button leveraging Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for first‑time profile setup collecting name and role and submitting to backend.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps children with authentication checks, showing login prompts or profile setup when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Restricts access based on user role and displays an access denied message when unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout with top navigation, footer, and content wrapper.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with branding, copyright, and a caffeine.ai referral link.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Displays the responsive top navigation bar with route links and login controls.
frontend/src/components/listings/Listing: Shows a promoted listing card with name, category, description, promo text, and contact info.
Dialog form for creating or editing promoted listings with input fields and submit handling.
Provides category and destination filters for listings through select and search inputs.
frontend/src/components/trips/MyTripsLis: Displays a list of user trips or empty/loading states with navigation to individual trip pages.
frontend/src/components/trips/SponsoredS: Shows sponsored listings matching a destination, formatted as suggestion cards.
frontend/src/components/trips/TripDetail: Form component that collects trip details, validates dates, and submits them via useCreateTrip, then triggers onSuccess with the created trip plan.
frontend/src/components/trips/TripPlanVi: Displays a trip plan summary with dates, type, notes, interests, and a day-by-day itinerary using styled UI components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Fetches the caller's user profile via the actor and derives authentication and role state for the UI.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, loading and managing identities, login flow, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useListings.ts: React-query hooks for fetching, creating, updating, deleting, and filtering promoted listings through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Mutation hooks for creating and updating the caller’s user profile with automatic cache invalidation and toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrips.ts: Hooks for fetching the caller’s trip plans and creating new trips using the backend actor with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying base styles globally.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/ExploreListingsPage.t: Fetches promoted listings, applies category and destination filters, and displays results or fallback UI.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the marketing landing page with hero, features, and navigation buttons for planning or exploring.
frontend/src/pages/OwnerDashboardPage.ts: Shows the business dashboard where owners manage promoted listings, including create, edit, and delete flows.
frontend/src/pages/TripPlanDetailPage.ts: Loads a specific trip plan by index, showing loading, not‑found state, or detailed trip view.
frontend/src/pages/TripPlannerPage.tsx: Provides tabs for creating new trips and viewing existing ones, integrating trip forms and trip list components.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (query or hash), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, feature list, architectural notes, and image requirements for the TripMate app.
